alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 4:54AM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pasco, northern Pinellas and northwestern Hillsborough Counties through 530 AM EST... At 453 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Holiday to near Palm Harbor to 6 miles northwest of Harbor Bluffs. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, New Port Richey, Holiday, Lutz, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, Beacon Square, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Harbor Bluffs, Egypt Lake-Leto, Citrus Park, Greater Carrollwood, Feather Sound and Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
